subject: Help
description_text:
Help pedals are not recognised in simsson manager but are recognised on Windows

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi G B,  Which pedal model did you purchase? Please use the VKB tool to run a quick check. If the issue is related to a missing certificate, I can assist you remotely via Todesk. No registration is needed — just provide your ID and temporary password.

I purchased pro x ultra pedals throttle brake clutch .. I don't know how to use the VKB tool I'm not very good with computers.  I don't know if it is missing a certificate

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi G B,     Please use the link I provided to download and install Todesk. After launching the software, if you see a registration page, simply click the close button at the top right corner to enter the main interface.     Once you’re in the main interface, please take a screenshot of your ID and temporary password, and send it to me. I will then be able to provide remote assistance.        https://dl.todesk.com/windows/ToDesk_Setup.exe

OK I will try to download

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

I can't read Chinese

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi G B,  Just these two pieces of information from the interface will be enough, thank you.

I can only see this number . Should I try to download TODESK in English?

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi G B,  Just click this button, and it will appear.

I got the pedals connected .. Thank you

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
